metadata.description: The name of the app insights instance that you wish to create.
The list of web tests to run. See the README for the schema of test descriptor object.

Configuration.WebTest: [concat('<WebTest Name="', parameters('tests')[0].name, '"',  ' Id="', guid(parameters('tests')[0].name) ,'"    Enabled="True" CssProjectStructure="" CssIteration="" Timeout="0" WorkItemIds="" xmlns="http://microsoft.com/schemas/VisualStudio/TeamTest/2010" Description="" CredentialUserName="" CredentialPassword="" PreAuthenticate="True" Proxy="default" StopOnError="False" RecordedResultFile="" ResultsLocale="">        <Items>        <Request Method="GET" Guid="a5f10126-e4cd-570d-961c-cea43999a200" Version="1.1" Url="', parameters('tests')[0].url ,'" ThinkTime="0" Timeout="300" ParseDependentRequests="True" FollowRedirects="True" RecordResult="True" Cache="False" ResponseTimeGoal="0" Encoding="utf-8" ExpectedHttpStatusCode="', parameters('webTestSettings')[0].expected ,'" ExpectedResponseUrl="" ReportingName="" IgnoreHttpStatusCode="False" /></Items></WebTest>')]
